attributes.action: Raise awareness about Muslims being put in concentration camps in China
attributes.additional_details: This is a modern day Holocaust yet no one’s talking about it. But what we are we gonna do? We’re gonna raise our voices loud and clear until people listen! We can make a difference and that difference starts now.
attributes.background: Imagine being tortured and shocked for months on end. Imagine being away from your family because you’re locked up in a ‘political education camp’. This is the story of many Muslims in China. They’re being put in concentration camps because they’re Muslim.
